HeaderSection.title: Internxt: a more secure pCloud alternative
HeaderSection.description: With phishing emails targeting pCloud users, the company denies a breach but gives no clear answers about how hackers obtained user emails.
HeaderSection.description2: Internxt provides the private cloud storage you can trust, with open-source transparency and built-in post-quantum encryption to keep your data safe and secure.

useCode.line2: at checkout for 80% off any annual or lifetime Internxt plan.

HeroSection.title: Internxt vs. pCloud comparison
HeroSection.description: Discover characteristics of Internxt that make it a more private pCloud alternative
HeroSection.tooltip: Although pCloud identifies as a Swiss company and claims compliance with Swiss privacy laws, it operates entirely in Bulgaria. Therefore, Bulgarian privacy laws apply. Users should consider this distinction regarding their data protection.

internxtFeatures.securityAudits: Regular security audits by the community

TablesSection.title: Internxt vs pCloud
TablesSection.description: Find out why Internxt’s privacy makes it a more secure alternative to pCloud

features.title: Open-Source Code
features.description: As Internxt's code is open to anyone, everyone may examine it and ensure its security. This transparency guarantees that no vulnerabilities are hidden.

features.title: Post-Quantum encryption
features.description: Internxt uses post-quantum end-to-end encryption. This encrypts files on your device and protects against the threat of quantum computers breaking current encryption technology.

features.title: Audited
features.description: Internxt's services have been reviewed by security experts by a leading European penetration testing company. This ensures your data stays secure against external threats like hackers and breaches.

features.title: Closed-Source Code
features.description: The closed-source aspect of pCloud's code implies that only the company can access it. Users have no way to check what is happening with their data.

features.title: pCloud Crypto
features.description: This encryption feature is not open-source but an extra-paid feature (without it, users are not protected). This raises questions about its real security and transparency.

features.title: Password Storage Concerns
features.description: Without open-source verification, how can you be sure that pCloud does not save your password or that other people can't access it?

inxtTable.title: Complete Security at No Extra Cost

features.title: Reasonable Plans
features.description: Attractive prices without any hidden charges.

features.title: Full Protection
features.description: All plans include free encryption and security features. We protect your data from the moment you create an account.

features.title: Pay More for Encryption
features.description: To protect your files with encryption, you must pay for the pCloud Crypto add-on.

features.title: Hidden Costs
features.description: Although pCloud plans may seem affordable, the additional cost of essential client-side encryption or additional download traffic can make your plan more expensive.

features.title: Community-Driven Development
features.description: Because Internxt is open source, it can be improved through community contributions and frequent evaluations by security professionals.

features.title: No Secrets
features.description: Clear policies and open-source code ensure that there are no surprises

features.title: Proprietary Software
features.description: pCloud is not transparent because it uses closed-source software

features.title: Trust Issues
features.description: Users have to trust pCloud blindly with their data without being able to check it.

features.title: Easy Interface
features.description: Simple to use with a focus on security and privacy.

features.title: Cross-Platform
features.description: Works on all major platforms, giving you easy access to your files.

pCloudTable.title: Additional Features but at a Price

features.title: Feature Set
features.description: pCloud offers many features but they come at an extra cost and privacy issues.

features.title: User Interface
features.description: The interface is outdated, making paying extra for an essential feature like encryption hurt the overall experience.

switchToInternxt.title: Switch to Internxt for a more secure, open, cost-effective cloud storage solution

title.line2: for 80% off secure, encrypted cloud storage

isPCloudSafeSection.title: Is pCloud safe?
isPCloudSafeSection.description: pCloud's closed-source encryption makes it difficult to verify its security effectiveness, raising concerns about accessing your files.

cards.title: Suspicious emails
cards.description: Many pCloud users have received phishing emails from scammers. It's unclear how hackers got these emails, but pCloud denies a data breach.

cards.title: Encryption
cards.description: Zero-knowledge encryption is an additional cost with pCloud. Consequently, free or even paid users might find their information less protected.

cards.title: Content scanning
cards.description: Many pCloud users have reported their accounts being unfairly terminated and taken down without warning due to suspected trademark violations or illegal content.

cards.title: Trackers
cards.description: pCloud uses trackers on its website (from Facebook, Twitter, and TikTok) to collect your data, increasing the risk of privacy breaches and unwanted marketing

CtaSection.title: No trackers. No problems.
CtaSection.description: Get complete privacy for your files with Internxt

WhyChooseInxtSection.title: Why should you choose Internxt as your pCloud alternative?
WhyChooseInxtSection.description: Discover features of Internxt that make us a more secure, private pCloud alternative

cards.title: Open source and transparent
cards.description: Internxt is an open-source alternative to pCloud as the code for all our products and services is available on GitHub. Our commitment to data security guarantees transparency about how your data is handled and protected.

cards.title: Security audited
cards.description: Internxt's services have been reviewed by security experts by a leading European penetration testing company. This ensures your data stays secure against external threats like hackers and breaches.

cards.title: Zero data tracking
cards.description: If you don’t want your data monitored to show personalized ads, then Internxt is a more private alternative to pCloud. We don’t use any trackers on our website that can review, monitor, or profit from your browsing.

cards.title: GDPR-compliant
cards.description: Internxt operates with complete transparency, ensuring your data privacy is protected by European laws. Our GDPR compliance guarantees your information is handled securely and according to strict regulations.

cards.title: Advanced encryption
cards.description: Internxt includes post-quantum encryption, the most secure and advanced cryptography available for free and paid accounts. We only store the encrypted version of your data, and only you have the key to decrypt and access it.

cards.title: Flexible storage plans
cards.description: Internxt Drive offers more paid plans and greater storage options than the pCloud pricing structure. If you need a pCloud alternative that offers monthly, annual, and lifetime plans, choose from any of our affordable plans, starting at 200GB to 10TB.

planTitles.homePage: Choose the right plan for you

tableSection.lifetimeDescription: Buy once and get privacy and security forever.
tableSection.planDescription: All Internxt plans are fully featured with complete access to all of our privacy services. Security for all shapes and sizes.
tableSection.businessDescription: We’re currently working on new Internxt plans designed exclusively to defend your business, protect your employees, and secure your bottom line.
tableSection.businessDescription2: Ensure business data security with Internxt's encrypted cloud storage plans.

freePlanCard.enjoy10gb: Enjoy 1GB forever and get access to all our services
